import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/cutom-button.component' import {addItem} from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import './collection-item.styles.scss' const CollectionItem = ({ id, name, price, imageUrl }) => (
{name} {price}
Add to cart
) export default CollectionItem
